content.question: Which of the following is the best indicator that a political regime is legitimate?

choices.label: Citizens follow laws because they believe in the government’s right to rule.
Citizens agree with the specific policy choices of the government.
Citizens do not challenge government actions, out of fear of imprisonment.
Citizens are allowed to participate in violent protests and are never imprisoned.

content.answer: Citizens follow laws because they believe in the government’s right to rule.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
